description:
When Iris goes to her home village on an assignment, Violet accompanies her. Iris`s birthday party sparks a disagreement with her family.
Source: netflix

titles.title: "Kimi wa Dougu de wa Naku, Sono Na ga Niau Hito ni Narunda"
Don`t Be a Tool, Become Someone That Matches with Their Name
Nie będziesz narzędziem, ale osobą godną tego imienia
「君は道具ではなく, その名が似合う人になるんだ」
「넌 도구가 아니라, 그 이름에 맞는 사람이 되는 거야」
